org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.server

Class WebSocketUpgradeFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.AbstractLifeCycle
      • org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.ContainerLifeCycle
        • org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.server.WebSocketUpgradeFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter, Container, Destroyable, Dumpable, LifeCycle, MappedWebSocketCreator

    @ManagedObject(value="WebSocket Upgrade Filter")
public class WebSocketUpgradeFilter
extends ContainerLifeCycle
implements Filter, MappedWebSocketCreator, Dumpable
    Inline Servlet Filter to capture WebSocket upgrade requests and perform path mappings to WebSocketCreator objects.
